title: Bride wearing light colored gown with lace ruffle on bottom of skirt and lace overlay on bodice with high neckline, long lace sleeves, and long veil with decorative headband over face, holding small floral bouquet, walking down light colored runner on church aisle with man wearing dark striped pants, dark morning coat and vest, light colored button down collared shirt, light colored ascot, and boutonniere, stained glass window and clock in background, men and women seated in pews on left and right
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
